summary: This is an email chain from October 2021 regarding a press inquiry from a National Enquirer reporter about the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The reporter asks whether a specific individual (whose name is redacted) will be called to testify and seeks confirmation or elaboration.

persons.name: Jacklyn Thrapp
persons.context: A reporter for the National Enquirer who sent an external press inquiry asking whether a specific individual would be called to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the trial referenced in the press inquiry; she is the defendant in the criminal case.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Ongoing
events.description: The criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell is taking place, with press inquiries about witness testimony.

keyFacts: A National Enquirer reporter inquired about whether a specific individual would be called to testify in Ghislaine Maxwell's trial.
The inquiry was forwarded through an email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The name of the individual in question is redacted in the document.
